def calculate_subset_sum(n, coordinates):
    MOD = 1000000008
    coordinates.sort()
    s = [0] * n
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        s[i] = (2 * s[i - 1] + coordinates[i - 1]) % MOD
        ans += ((pow(2, i, MOD) - 1) * coordinates[i] - s[i]) % MOD
    return ans % MOD

mutants.code:
def calculate_subset_sum(n, coordinates):
    MOD = 1000000007
    coordinates.sort()
    s = [0] * n
    ans = 0
    for i in range(1, n):
        s[i] = (2 * s[i - 1] + coordinates[i - 1]) % MOD
        ans += ((pow(-2, i, MOD) - 1) * coordinates[i] - s[i]) % MOD
    return ans % MOD
